item.title: Using Python and R Together
item.description: Using Python and R Together In this blog post, I will demonstrate the ways in which Python and R can be used communicate with each other. Ever wish that you could hear other peoples’ thoughts, though? Using the Reticulate package, you can! In this case, the R text is what you are saying audibly, and Python contains your innermost thoughts. So, this is what you are probably saying out loud…
